name: omega-edit
author: Shane Dell, Davin Shearer, John Wass

scripts.prepackage:default: ./compile-proto.sh && tsc -p ./ && ./compile-proto.sh --out && cp .npmignore package.json README.md out && cp -r src/*.d.ts out
scripts.prepackage:windows: ./compile-proto.sh && tsc -p ./ && ./compile-proto.sh --out && copy .npmignore package.json README.md out && copy -r src/*.d.ts out
scripts.postpackage:default: rm -rf out/*.d.ts out/.npmignore out/package.json out/README.md && mv out/omega-edit* .
scripts.postpackage:windows: del /q out/*.d.ts out/.npmignore out/package.json out/README.md && move out/omega-edit* .
